Got Talent star is throwing the party at her Â£ 300,000 gated home in Blackburn tomorrow, according to The Sun. The paper claims that the singer has invited both Piers Morgan and Simon Cowell to the event. We've heard Simon Cowell and Piers Morgan have been invited, a source said.`` Susan Boyle 's very keen to see Piers Morgan again.'' However, with Piers Morgan currently filming for his new CNN show in America it seems unlikely that he will be in attendance.
